articles.title: LG announces five Gram laptops for 2021 with 16:10 displays and convertible form factors - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: LG has delivered a few Gram-related surprises ahead of CES 2021. Not only will the company unveil new 14, 16 and 17-inch laptops next week, but it will unveil convertible 14 and 16-inch models. LG's new Gram lineup will all feature 16:10 displays and Intel Ti…
articles.content: LG had already unveiled three new Gram laptops for 2021 in South Korea, but it has now announced another two models. LG will showcase the five laptops at its CES 2021 virtual showroom, which will be … [+1803 chars]
